title: The MasterMinders – Event Ticketing (Shopify)
alt: Event ticketing landing page with countdown bar, 4.8 Trustpilot rating, gradient hero copy 'It’s time to stop Googling growth strategies', and a 'Buy Tickets' CTA next to a group photo.
description: Conversion-focused Shopify event site with urgency messaging, social proof, and streamlined checkout for ticket sales.
features: Urgency bar with live countdown and limited seats messaging
Trustpilot badge integration near hero
Primary 'Buy Tickets' CTA mapped to a fast checkout
Event IA: About, Pricing, Schedule, Exhibitors, FAQ

title: Daily Furniture – Lifestyle Storefront (Shopify)
alt: Furniture homepage with two mustard sofas, headline 'Timeless Style, Lasting Comfort', persistent offer strip, and 'Shop Now' CTA.
description: Lifestyle-first Shopify theme emphasizing visual merchandising, offer communication, and clear category navigation.
features: Hero section with lifestyle imagery and primary CTA
Top promo strip for limited-time offers
Category navigation with search/account/cart
Clean layout optimized for content and SEO

title: Millie & Jones – Beds & Mattresses (Shopify)
alt: Back-to-school sale hero with red loft bed, countdown bar (days, hours, minutes, seconds), BNPL Klarna, warranty strip, and Trustpilot reviews.
description: Promotion-led Shopify storefront combining urgency, BNPL, warranty, and verified reviews for high trust and conversion.
features: Granular countdown timer for time-boxed sales
BNPL (Klarna) and five-year guarantee badges
Verified review cards surfaced on homepage
Category-first IA (Kids Beds, Teen Beds, etc.)

title: Silent Moment – Spa & Memberships (Shopify)
alt: Spa homepage with full-bleed massage imagery, 'Book Now' CTA, and nav for Spa Treatments, Gift Cards, Locations, and Memberships.
description: Service-forward Shopify site with booking integration, giftable SKUs, and recurring value through memberships.
features: Hero-level booking CTA integrated into the flow
Gift cards and memberships as first-class nav items
Wellness imagery for brand storytelling
Multi-location readiness via dedicated Locations nav

title: LegalTech Compliance & Research Platform (MERN)
alt: Legal research homepage with login card, webinar hero 'Microsoft Word for Lawyers', and product tiles for practice management, compliance, contracts, and academy.
description: MERN-based LegalTech platform combining database search, analytics, compliance workflows, and training modules for law practices and corporate teams.
features: Role-based authentication with enterprise/IP access
Indexed database search with filters and analytics
Modular apps for practice management, compliance, contracts
Events/webinar CMS for training and user education

title: AI Chat SaaS Landing (MERN)
alt: AI assistant landing with headline introducing DeftGPT, a free trial CTA, laptop chat UI, and model badges for Claude, GPT-4, Llama 2, and Gemini-pro.
description: SaaS marketing site and app shell for a multi-model AI assistant with free trial, authentication, and credits-based usage.
features: OAuth login, free trial gating, and subscription billing
Model routing layer with per-model credit tracking
Responsive marketing pages (Features, Pricing, Affiliate, Blog)
Chat UI scaffold with document and prompt workflows
